title: Chaos
description: This is the FINAL book in the Unhinged Trilogy, the conclusion to Sebastian and Payton’s story.Secrets...The secrets are still there, plaguing me, disrupting my everyday life, only now... the unthinkable has happened.Lies...Payton insists that it is time that I deal with the lies that seem to make up my entire existence, the ones that have produced the chaos in my head. I don’t know if she realizes it, but if it weren’t for her being by my side, I don’t know how I would survive.Greed...Everything is unfolding right before my eyes, the truth is being revealed and there are people who don’t want us to be together, but as I have vowed before, no one will keep her from me. Payton is my anchor in the waves that are crashing through my life and I will do anything to keep her safe.My name is Sebastian Trovato and this is the conclusion of my story.From New York Times bestselling author Nicole Edwards, writing as Timberlyn Scott.
author: Timberlyn Scott
